search_results.snippet: Trawling is a method of fishing that involves pulling a fishing net through the water behind one or more boats. The boats that are used for trawling are called trawlers or draggers. Trawling can be contrasted with trolling, where baited fishing lines instead of trawls are drawn through the water.
